comment: Smart Data Models - GovGAST3 adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/GovGAST3/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Generic turbogas with acceleration and temperature controller.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: bca
contents.comment: Acceleration limit set-point (Bca).  Unit = 1/s.  Typical Value = 0.01. Default: 0.0

contents.name: bp
contents.comment: Droop (bp).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: dtc
contents.comment: Exhaust temperature variation due to fuel flow increasing from 0 to 1 PU (deltaTc).  Typical Value = 390. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ka
contents.comment: Minimum fuel flow (Ka).  Typical Value = 0.23. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kac
contents.comment: Fuel system feedback (K).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kca
contents.comment: Acceleration control integral gain (Kca). Unit = 1/s.  Typical Value = 100. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ksi
contents.comment: Gain of radiation shield (Ksi).  Typical Value = 0.8. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ky
contents.comment: Coefficient of transfer function of fuel valve positioner (Ky).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: mnef
contents.comment: Fuel flow maximum negative error value (MN).  Typical Value = -0.05. Default: 0.0

contents.name: mxef
contents.comment: Fuel flow maximum positive error value (MX).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: rcmn
contents.comment: Minimum fuel flow (RCMN).  Typical Value = -0.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: rcmx
contents.comment: Maximum fuel flow (RCMX).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: tac
contents.comment: Fuel control time constant (Tac).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

contents.name: tc
contents.comment: Compressor discharge volume time constant (Tc).  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0

contents.name: td
contents.comment: Temperature controller derivative gain (Td).  Typical Value = 3.3. Default: 0

contents.name: tfen
contents.comment: Turbine rated exhaust temperature correspondent to Pm=1 PU (Tfen).  Typical Value = 540. Default: 0.0

contents.name: tg
contents.comment: Time constant of speed governor (Tg).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0

contents.name: tsi
contents.comment: Time constant of radiation shield (Tsi).  Typical Value = 15. Default: 0

contents.name: tt
contents.comment: Temperature controller integration rate (Tt).  Typical Value = 250. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ttc
contents.comment: Time constant of thermocouple (Ttc).  Typical Value = 2.5. Default: 0

contents.name: ty
contents.comment: Time constant of fuel valve positioner (Ty).  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
